content: very basic and beginner friendly pattern that can be worked up in under ten minutes pin this to your coat to show your support of freedom for the people of palestine the watermelon is a symbol of resistance it was used to signal others when the palestinian flag was banned as it has the same colours free palestine please tag me @ frednamakes 1 on instagram if you do make this watermelonia gaza intifada stop the genocide 1 https //www instagram com/frednamakes/
